sentences.en: A huge tusk decorated the wall of his study.
sentences.cn: 他书房的墙上装饰着一支巨大的象牙.

sentences.en: Elephants wear the tusk down faster than they can grow it.
sentences.cn: 象牙磨损的速度快于生长的速度。

sentences.en: First find the key to the museum, then get the mammoth tusk from the natural history wing.
sentences.cn: 首先找到进入博物馆的门，然后从自然历史展区拿到猛犸象牙。

sentences.en: I wonder how much elephant tusk, rhino horn or a stuffed lion will cost when they vanish.
sentences.cn: 我好奇当他们都绝迹的时候，象牙，犀牛角以及狮子标本会值多少钱。

sentences.en: If this is artificial or imitation ivory, it must be from a false tusk.
sentences.cn: 如果这是人造的或仿造的象牙, 它必是来自假长牙.

sentences.en: Mammoth Tank: Health increased by 15 %. Tusk Rockets range increased by 17 %, splash radius increased.
sentences.cn: 猛犸坦克: 生命值上升15%. 象牙火箭射程增加17%, 杀伤范围增大.

sentences.en: One tusk - --- retain good throw away bad.
sentences.cn: 一齿 ---- 保有良好的,远离坏的.

sentences.en: That hole is now being filled - thanks to narwhals, medium-size whales, endemic to the Arctic, known as unicorns of the seas because of the single, spiralling tusk found in males.
sentences.cn: 这个洞现在正在被填补起来--这归功于角鲸，一种中等大小的，北极特有的鲸，因为雄鲸长着一个螺旋纹的长牙而被称为海中的独角兽。

sentences.en: The male narwhal's extraordinary 1 tusk, up to three meters long, inspired 2 legends 3 of unicorns long ago.
sentences.cn: 公角鲸奇特的长牙(长达三米)在古时曾引发关于独角兽的传说.

sentences.en: The narwhal's single, spiral tusk has always been a mystery.
sentences.cn: 独角鲸那独一无二的螺旋状尖角总是被视为神秘之物.

sentences.en: We place you herewith a sample order for $ 750, for walrus tusk and whale tooth carving.
sentences.cn: 为订购海象牙与鲸鱼牙齿雕刻品,现寄上美金750元, 请立即安排发货.

words.tran_cn: 有长牙的动物（象，野猪等）

trans.tran_cn: （象等动物的）长牙，獠牙，尖形物，尖头
trans.tran_en: one of a pair of very long pointed teeth, that stick out of the mouth of animals such as  elephants
